description:
After leaving the Asakura clan behind and coming to work for the Oda clan, Akechi Mitsuhide tells Nobunaga that he’ll set up a meeting with him and Ashikaga Yoshiaki. Nobunaga agrees to this because he wants to take advantage of the shogun’s authority.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La visite du maître de la répartie
